subject: The Internet Patrol -  Yahoo Sued Over Jailing of Chinese Journalist
body:
Mailer 04



 
 The Internet Patrol
 



The Latest News at the Internet Patrol
 Here is today's news from the Internet Patrol!  

Note: We are testing new formats for the Internet Patrol mailings!  Please let us know what you think at info@theinternetpatrol.com!
 

 Yahoo Sued Over Jailing of Chinese Journalist 

    2007-06-27 10:00:26-04  
    The mother of a Chinese journalist Shi Tao, who was jailed for ten years by the Chinese government after Yahoo cooperated with Chinese authorities and revealed Shi Tao's identity and personal details to them, is suing Yahoo in U.S. Federal court. 
Read more...
